LanguageData.AYWoodAsh_Bucket.label: Bucket (Wood Ash)
LanguageData.AYWoodAsh_Bucket.description: A bucket full of wood ash. Can be thrown onto areas where trees grow to slightly improve their growth, remove blight from plants and prevent fires from catching.
